categories: Category:Battles of the Yuuzhan Vong War

nodes.text: Around the end of the year 28 ABY, during the Yuuzhan Vong War between the Yuuzhan Vong species and the Galactic Alliance, the Yuuzhan Vong attacked the planet Generis. The Yuuzhan Vong destroyed the Outer Rim Communications Center on the planet before fleeing from an Imperial Remnant fleet.
